name: City Sniper Legend - Shooter Game 2017
description:
City Sniper legend 3D Game is the best first person shooter action game with sniper aiming to offer you a realistic battle against your enemies. Sniper Kill Shoot Assassin is an amalgamation of all the commando and mission based games. Sniper warrior is an action game about a front line army special force personal who is willing to sacrifice his life to save his country from the criminal mafia.
You must eliminate the invasion by killing your enemies and defend & respond to their counter shooting. 3D assassin is an Extreme challenging really bloodshed commando 3D action game with gorilla attack, huge destruction. Step into the FPS action series, one of the best Army Sniper game available on App Store.
Missions:
Take out all the criminals in the city and the save the city from a blackout that these criminals are planning. Most of the criminals are ex Russian military and warfare criminals, so you have to be very careful before opening fire. Once you have taken the first kill shot, you will be spotted and these dictator militants will start shooting at you. As all these missions are in the city, there will be no air strike, tanks, helicopters or heavy weapons like, shotguns, rocket launchers, or assault rifles for you.
Prepare the modern sniper assault and get ready to clean your city from attackers, thugs and thieves who are ruining the city peace. Be a war agent professional sniper swat force and prove your sniper skills by completing challenging missions. Your armor is designed to save you from gunshots but be careful, it won’t stay for long and exposure to bullets will damage the armor and eventually get you killed.
This is the time for you to prove that tactical ops are not only effective in battlefield, but a major adversary in sniper shooter warfare as well. This unique army sniper warfare game is designed keeping in mind the modern warfare techniques and combat style. There will be civilians around so be very careful and do not kill any civilians. Try to take head shots in all missions as it will save you ammo and will kill the target in one shot.
Environment and Graphics:
City Sniper 3d Shooting contains realistic 3d graphics and real battlefield sound effects. Equip yourself with most modern sniper 3d weapons and play in multiple levels. If you don't get all the enemy soldiers with modern sniper before your enemy escaped, you will lose. City Sniper Shooting is free to play, but you can choose to pay real money for some extra items.
HOW TO PLAY:
- Press start button for play
- Select your mission to play
- Swipe to adjust the aim for shooting
- Tap on the bullet button to fire
Features:
- First-person shooting game with precise controls
- User friendly GUI and controls
- Fast and intense killing action
- Unlimited bullets to fire for rapid crime control
- Perfect action fight simulation
- Efficient weapon controls & movement
- Free to play
If you like this game, please try other games by clicking “More from Developer” or by visiting our publisher account. And don’t forget to rate and review.
